DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Study Activity Relationship Clinical Study Activity Relationship Comment java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The relationship between clinical study activities specified in a study protocol. It might refer to a temporal or sequential relationship, or indicate the possibility of performing a particular type of activity as a substitute for another one._An additional description of the relationship between the clinical study activities specified in a study protocol. It might refer to a temporal or sequential relationship, or indicate the possibility of performing a particular type of activity as a substitute for another one._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.
